Description.Text:
Property Location
In the heart of Mooloolaba, Osprey Apartments is close to Mooloolaba Beach and Underwater World Sea Life. This 4-star apartment is within close proximity of Sunshine Plaza and Kawana Beach.

Rooms
Make yourself at home in one of the individually decorated guestrooms, featuring kitchens with refrigerators and stovetops. Rooms have private balconies. Complimentary wireless Internet access keeps you connected, and DVD players are provided for your entertainment. Conveniences include microwaves and washers/dryers, and you can also request cribs/infant beds (surcharge).

Rec, Spa, Premium Amenities
Don’t miss out on the many recreational opportunities, including an outdoor pool, a spa tub, and a fitness center. This apartment also features complimentary wireless Internet access, tour/ticket assistance, and barbecue grills.

Business, Other Amenities
Featured amenities include laundry facilities and an elevator (lift). Free self parking is available onsite.


Check-in time starts at 2 PM Check-out time is 10 AM

Extra-person charges may apply and vary depending on hotel policy.
Government-issued photo identification and a credit card or cash deposit are required at check-in for incidental charges.
Special requests are subject to availability upon check-in and may incur additional charges. Special requests cannot be guaranteed.
  • The name on the credit card used at check-in to pay for incidentals must be the primary name on the guestroom reservation.

Complimentary wireless Internet access keeps you connected, and DVD players are provided for your entertainment. Conveniences include microwaves and washers/dryers, and you can also request cribs/infant beds (surcharge).

In the heart of Mooloolaba, Osprey Apartments is close to Mooloolaba Beach and Underwater World Sea Life. This 4-star apartment is within close proximity of Sunshine Plaza and Kawana Beach.
Distances are calculated in a straight line from the property's location to the point of interest or attraction, and may not reflect actual travel distance.

Distances are displayed to the nearest 0.1 mile and kilometer.

Mooloolaba Beach - 0.9 km / 0.5 mi
Underwater World Sea Life - 1.1 km / 0.7 mi
Sunshine Plaza - 3.4 km / 2.1 mi
Kawana Beach - 3.8 km / 2.4 mi
Twin Waters Golf Club - 6 km / 3.7 mi
Aussie World - 10.6 km / 6.6 mi
Dickey Beach - 11.9 km / 7.4 mi
Big Pineapple - 12.3 km / 7.6 mi
Queensland Zoo - 12.4 km / 7.7 mi
Mt Coolum Golf Club - 12.4 km / 7.7 mi
Moffat Beach - 13 km / 8.1 mi
Shelly Beach - 14.1 km / 8.7 mi
Caloundra Events Center - 14.2 km / 8.8 mi
Kings Beach - 14.4 km / 8.9 mi
Bulcock Beach - 14.7 km / 9.1 mi

The nearest airports are:
Maroochydore, QLD (MCY-Sunshine Coast) - 8.3 km / 5.2 mi
Brisbane, QLD (BNE) - 78.9 km / 49 mi

The preferred airport for Osprey Apartments is Brisbane, QLD (BNE).

You must present a photo ID when checking in. Your credit card is charged at the time you book. Bed type and smoking preferences are not guaranteed.Your reservation is prepaid and is guaranteed for late arrival. The total charge includes all room charges and taxes, as well as fees for access and booking. Any incidental charges such as parking, phone calls, and room service will be handled directly between you and the property.

Extra-person charges may apply and vary depending on hotel policy.
Government-issued photo identification and a credit card or cash deposit are required at check-in for incidental charges.
Special requests are subject to availability upon check-in and may incur additional charges. Special requests cannot be guaranteed.
  • The name on the credit card used at check-in to pay for incidentals must be the primary name on the guestroom reservation.
